pageContext.claim: “President Obama had -- he more than doubled -- he put more debt on than all of the other presidents of the United States combined. Combine all the debt of every other president.”
pageContext.analysis: In terms of raw numbers, the national debt doubled under Obama, but some of that was due to circumstances out of his control, such as the recession and laws passed by previous Congresses. Meanwhile, the debt is also projected to double again by 2024 under Trump's policies.
